name: cement production, ZN/D, new alternative constituents 36-50%, in conformity with SIA 2049 | waste concrete gravel | Cutoff, S
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/25949/documentation

The dataset describes the production of cement Susteno (technical appreviation according to SIA 2049: ZN/D) from mixed granulate in Switzerland.;Appart from clinker and mixed recycled aggregates, burnt shale is another main component.

The activity starts with the clinker in the silo to be used for cement production and with the additional  ingredients of the cement - notably mixed recycled aggregates from deconstruction and burnt shale -  at the gate of the cement plant
  From cradle, i.e. including all upstream activities.

This activity ends with the cement produced in the cement mill. The dataset does not include packaging and administration.
category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The cement Susteno is made of processed mixed granulate from demolition projects as a major additive. The cement Susteno reduces the clinker content of the cement and contributes to a closed material cycle.

exchanges.description: approximation for mixed recycled aggregates; company-specific information

flow.name: waste concrete gravel
flow.category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2395:Manufacture of articles of concrete, cement and plaster
